website_summaries.verdict: Cool and comfy—this may be the best way to describe the fourth-generation Techamphibian by Salomon. Another befitting description for it has to be: “a remarkably amphibious lightweight wonder.” There is only one pebble that hinders its reputation from getting a flawless status—its hit-or-miss arch support.Overall, despite its lone misfire, the Salomon Techamphibian 4 is a fantastic piece whose handful of defining qualities allow for countless days of enjoyment on the trail.
pros: Several verified buyers celebrate the Salomon Techamphibian 4’s excellently breathable confines
Its incredible level of comfort has stoked a number of trail adventurers
This astonishing shoe-type hiker from Salomon has received praise from a small group of patrons for being spectacularly lightweight
The footgear’s performance in wet conditions has amazed less than a handful of users
A couple of consumers find their Salomon Techamphibian 4 water shoes super protective against intrusive debris
One reviewer is impressed by the shoe’s unbelievably sticky Contagrip outsole
cons: The men’s and women’s Salomon Techamphibian 4 gets low ratings from a couple of purchasers for having underwhelming arch support

customer_reviews.title: Salomon USED to make great quality shoes.  NOT anymore. These shoes are like cheap slippers. AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bought and worn Salomon techamphibian for over 16 years. This was the best shoe design for his high arches. however this year Salomon changed the design. Just received today and tried them on and does not distribute weight correctly around his high arches. The material is not the same quality. Feels like a cheap pair of bedroom slippers for a high price. I am on the hunt to buy up all the techamphibian 3 for my husband. No quality anymore!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart After 3 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: These have been a HUGE disappointment for my son! He's only worn them for 3 weeks and they are falling apart.. very dissatisfied. I'd love my $ back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tech amphibian is an awesome everyday shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I had the previous generation of the tech amphibious shoe from Solomon. They lasted way longer than I expected and I wore them all the time because they are so light and airy. The new shoe fits well and feels good, I’m hoping for the same longevity from the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M Briner

customer_reviews.title: Best watersport for kayaking and also hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect show for kayaking. Keeps all the gravel out yet perfect for hiking comfortably and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Custrock

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews but always read them, and in this case I felt compelled as this is my 2nd pair of tech amphibians. This version is so much lighter and sleeker; I was blown away by the 1st pair and the 4th generation is excellent and even better. Comfy right out of the box, lots of traction, slip on/off versatility, and utterly waterproof, these are a dream to wear all summer long. I'm not even kidding, best show ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sean0101

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Techamphibian 4 Water Shoes
product_meta.description: A completely modern evolution of the original multi-activity adventure shoe, TECHAMPHIBIAN 4 has been completely redesigned with a sleek, welded upper and more cushioned midsole. It's more dynamic than ever, while retaining the ease, versatility, and water capability that made Techamphibian legendary.
feature_bullets: Convenience : With a collapsible heel and quicklace, this shoe goes from an easy slip on to a performance outdoor shoe in an instant.
Outdoor capability : A Contagrip outsole, protective toe cap and quicklace adjustment provide the grip, protection and foothold that you expect from a performance outdoor shoe.
Water performance : Super breathable mesh lets water evacuate the shoe, but doesn't let debris in.
